sparck 1.0.0

sparck

Support Package for Analysis, Research, Collaboration and Knowledge

A system to provide support to your work through the availability of a several standardised functions for divers manipulations and analysis. Take a look inside the online document to overview the panel of possibilities and don’t hesitate to share your needs in terms of future development.

Installation

For an installation of the package from the last validated version like so:

devtools::install_github("https://github.com/umr-marbec/sparck")

Support and improvement

If you need any support, encounter any bug or you would like to add enhancements or suggestions of improvements, you can use the GitHub issues page.
